properties.entry: SELECT /* 페이징 처리를 위한 전체 게시물 수 조회용 메소드 */ /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL_BD A WHERE A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC'

SELECT /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#selectTotalCount() */ /* 게시물 전체 조회용 메소드 */ A.RNUM , A.HT_BD_NO , A.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HT_BD_TITLE , A.HT_BD_CONTENT , A.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HT_BD_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HT_BD_FILE , A.HT_MEM_NO , A.HT_BD_STATUS , A.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HT_BD_NO , B.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HT_BD_TITLE , B.HT_BD_CONTENT , B.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HT_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HT_BD_FILE , B.HT_MEM_NO , B.HT_BD_STATUS , B.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT C.HT_BD_NO , C.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , C.HT_BD_TITLE , C.HT_BD_CONTENT , C.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HT_BD_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HT_BD_FILE , C.HT_MEM_NO , C.HT_BD_STATUS , C.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM HOTEL_BD C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HT_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HT_BD_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

UPDATE /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#incrementNoticeCount() */ /* 조회수 증가 메소드 */ HOTEL_BD A SET A.HT_BD_WATCHED = (SELECT B.HT_BD_WATCHED FROM HOTEL_BD B WHERE HT_BD_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.HT_BD_NO = ?

INSERT INTO HOTEL_BD ( HT_BD_NO , HT_BD_TITLE , HT_BD_CONTENT , HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , HT_BD_WATCHED , HT_BD_FILE , HT_MEM_NO , HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , HT_BD_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_HT_BD_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , NULL , ? , ? ,'PUBLIC' )

SELECT /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#selectNoticeDetail() */ /* 상세페이지 메소드 */ A.HT_BD_NO , A.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HT_BD_TITLE , A.HT_BD_CONTENT , A.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HT_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , A.HT_BD_FILE , A.HT_MEM_NO , A.HT_BD_STATUS , A.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM HOTEL_BD A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.HT_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HT_BD_NO = ?
UPDATE /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#htUpdateNotice() */ HOTEL_BD A SET A.HT_BD_TITLE = ? , A.HT_BD_CONTENT = ? WHERE HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND HT_BD_NO = ?
UPDATE /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#deleteNotice() */ HOTEL_BD A SET A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PRIVATE' WHERE A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HT_BD_NO = ?

SELECT /* 게시판 검색 결과 갯수 조회용 메소드 */ /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#searchWriterNoticeCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL_BD A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.HT_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#searchTitleNoticeCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL_BD A WHERE A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HT_BD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#searchContentNoticeCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL_BD A WHERE A.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HT_BD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* 게시판 검색 결과 조회용 메소드 */ /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#searchWriterNotice() */ A.RNUM , A.HT_BD_NO , A.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HT_BD_TITLE , A.HT_BD_CONTENT , A.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HT_BD_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HT_BD_FILE , A.HT_MEM_NO , A.HT_BD_STATUS , A.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HT_BD_NO , B.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HT_BD_TITLE , B.HT_BD_CONTENT , B.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HT_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HT_BD_FILE , B.HT_MEM_NO , B.HT_BD_STATUS , B.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT C.HT_BD_NO , C.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , C.HT_BD_TITLE , C.HT_BD_CONTENT , C.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HT_BD_WATCHED , E.MEM_NAME , C.HT_BD_FILE , C.HT_MEM_NO , C.HT_BD_STATUS , C.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM HOTEL_BD C JOIN MEM_INFO E ON(C.HT_MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HT_BD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

AND ?

SELECT /* creation.notice.model.dao.HTNoticeDAO#searchContentNotice() */ A.RNUM , A.HT_BD_NO , A.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HT_BD_TITLE , A.HT_BD_CONTENT , A.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HT_BD_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HT_BD_FILE , A.HT_MEM_NO , A.HT_BD_STATUS , A.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HT_BD_NO , B.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HT_BD_TITLE , B.HT_BD_CONTENT , B.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HT_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HT_BD_FILE , B.HT_MEM_NO , B.HT_BD_STATUS , B.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM (SELECT C.HT_BD_NO , C.HT_BD_CATEGORY_NO , C.HT_BD_TITLE , C.HT_BD_CONTENT , C.HT_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HT_BD_WATCHED , E.MEM_NAME , C.HT_BD_FILE , C.HT_MEM_NO , C.HT_BD_STATUS , C.HT_BD_CMT_COUNT FROM HOTEL_BD C JOIN MEM_INFO E ON(C.HT_MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HT_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HT_BD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.HT_BD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
